structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 16. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Accident and death benefits for members of volunteer fire departments.
